titleStmt.title: [The maid is the best that lies alone.]

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Williamson in Canon street and at the Bible on London-Bridgee,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "You young maids that would live chary,".
Imprint on p.[2] reads: Printed for R.H. & J Williamson in Cannon street and at the Bible on London Bridge.
Imperfect. Filmed copy trimmed deleting title.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
